title: Nico’s Selection of School Idol DVD Marathon - The Second Time
detail_text: <:th_ch0009/>Your eagerness to learn the essence of a school idol from this Nico is excellent, Shioriko. You get me, don’t you?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Thank you very much. I’m in the middle of gathering various lessons from my senior school idols<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Eh? Did you already go to learn from someone else before coming to me?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>....More importantly, I was wondering if you could tell me about the key to your success, Nico-san. I believe that you, as the number one school idol in the universe, have some thoughts of your own on the matter<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Well, that’s true! All the lessons you’ve received so far have been nothing but introductions Nico! Listen well, before I tell you about the essence of a school idol, there’s something that you need to complete first. And that is....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>That is....?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>To watch all 10 parts of Nico’s selection of school idol DVD marathon....! Hanamaru has been the only one to finish it so far.... Can you do it?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Only Hanamaru-san has....? I wonder if I can do it.... No, it’s not whether I can do it or not, right. It’s that I have to do it! Please let me try, Nico-san!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Fufufu.... Those are some pretty good eyes you’re making.... Alright then, let’s do it!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Okay!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
